sentences.sContent: I cannot condone the use of violence under any circumstances.
sentences.sCn: 我不能原谅在任何情况下使用暴力。

words.tran: （夫妻间对对方通奸的）宽恕；赦免；赎罪

trans.tranCn: 宽恕， 赦免； 纵容， 容忍
trans.tranOther: to accept or forgive behaviour that most people think is morally wrong
